about.title: About WriteSpace
about.description: WriteSpace is a multilingual blogging platform designed for the diverse linguistic landscape of India.
about.storyDescription: Founded in 2025, WriteSpace emerged from a simple observation: while India has incredible linguistic diversity with over 22 official languages and hundreds of dialects, online content creation remains predominantly English-centric.
about.missionDescription: At WriteSpace, we believe that everyone's voice deserves to be heard. Our platform aims to:
about.missionPoint1: Empower writers to publish in multiple Indian languages
about.missionPoint2: Connect readers with diverse content they might otherwise never discover
about.missionPoint3: Preserve and promote India's linguistic heritage
about.missionPoint4: Foster cross-cultural understanding through translated content
about.missionPoint5: Create a supportive community for writers of all backgrounds
about.teamDescription: WriteSpace is built by a passionate team of writers, developers, and language enthusiasts from across India.
about.joinDescription: Whether you're a writer looking to share your voice or a reader eager to explore diverse perspectives, WriteSpace welcomes you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: At WriteSpace, we take your privacy seriously. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

privacy.personalDataListItem2: When users publish or edit articles
